height.label: Height
height.info: Height is always set to 100% on mobile.

header_contact_information.info: To display your contact information, link them in your Theme settings.

header_variant_selector.info: Variant selector always shows if available. You can configure variant options to display as swatches in Theme settings.

header_newsletter.info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers).

header_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#featured-collection-show-product-rating).

header_currency_selector.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_product_specifications.info: To display product specifications, customize in Theme settings

enable_product_rating.label: Enable product rating
enable_product_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block).

image_ratio.info: Only applicable to main item if stacked
image_ratio.label: Image ratio

show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay.  [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/vi/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)

enable_contact.label: Show email address and phone number

show_stock_number.label: Show stock number
show_stock_number.info: Basic stock information still shows without stock number.

show_color_swatches.label: Show color swatches
show_color_swatches.info: Only shows if variant swatches is enabled

enable_pagination_mobile.label: Show paginations as number on mobile

size_guide_paragraph.content: Display information about product sizing which can support buyer's purchasing decision when selecting the right product option. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)

desktop_filter_and_sort_layout.label: Filter and sort layout on large screen

content_position.info: Only works when text overlay on image
content_position.label: Content position

content_ordering.label: Content ordering
content_ordering.info: This setting only works on large screen

selected_page.label: Selected page
selected_page.info: Contact forms in the selected page will not be displayed

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: To change the color scheme, update your Theme settings.

custom_icon.label: Custom Icon
custom_icon.info: Custom icon will replace theme icon. Use square image for best result.

custom_image.label: Custom image
custom_image.info: Use square image for best result.

custom_svg.label: Custom SVG
custom_svg.info: The SVG icon will be rendered at the pre-defined size.

display_type.label: Display type
display_type.info: Recommend using 'List' for up to 3 items and 'Slideshow' for more than 3 items.

enable_more_button.label: Enable "More" button
enable_more_button.info: Shorten description content when content is too long.

height_on_large_screen.label: Height on large screen
height_on_large_screen.info: Section height self-adjusts for lengthy texts on large screens.

icon_source.label: Icon source
icon_source.info: Select one of the three sources below to display as an icon

show_full_specifications.info: If uncheck, only three specifications will be displayed. The rest will be available in a 'View more' popup.
show_full_specifications.label: Show full specifications

header_quick_links.info: To display quick links, link them in your Theme settings.

rating_info.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/vi/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

paragraph_complementary_products.content: To select complementary products, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)

enable_highlighted_collections.label: Enable highlighted collections
enable_highlighted_collections.info: Show a list of product collections next to menu for better catalogue navigation

enable_view_all.label: Show button to view all collections

items_per_row_on_desktop.label: Items per row on large screen

video_alt_text.label: Video alt text
video_alt_text.info: Provide video description for screen reader users. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)

enable_popup.label: Enable popup
enable_popup.info: Closed popups without submitting won't appear until next visit.

when_to_show.label: When to show
when_to_show.info: "After add to cart" will trigger popup once visitors close the cart drawer.

enable_sticky.label: Enable sticky popup when dismissing
enable_sticky.info: Popup shows as a sticky label after first dismissal.

paragraph_one.content: Subscribers added automatically to your "Email subscribers" customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header_direction_button.content: The Google Maps link needs to be filled for the button to show.

menu_item_name.label: Menu item name
menu_item_name.info: Enter menu item name for this mega menu. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-header/#Mega_menu)

enable_sticky.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

enable_drawer.label: Enable drawer menu on large screens

contact_info.label: Contact information
contact_info.info: To display your contact information, link them in your Theme settings.

enable_contact.label: Show email address and phone number on menu drawer

enable_search.label: Show full search box instead of icon

enable_quick_link.label: Show quick links
enable_quick_link.info: To display quick links, link them in your Theme settings.

description.label: Slideshow description
description.info: Describe slideshow for screen reader users.

view_details_button_paragraph.content: Use this to direct users to the product page.

show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message.
show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products

enable_more_button.label: Enable "Read more" button
enable_more_button.info: Shorten description content when more than 150 characters

paragraph.content: Shows available offline stores for the selected variant. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

show_sticky_purchasing_bar.label: Show sticky purchasing bar when scrolling down

enable_view_more.label: Enable "View all" button
enable_view_more.info: Appears if collection has more products than shown.

blog_post_list.info: Appears if blog post list has more blog posts than shown.

heading.info: Collection title is used if none is set.

menu_group.info: Note: Level 1 menu is used as a heading without a link (just apply for menus that have sub-menus).

show_payment.label: Show payment icons
show_payment.info: Icons display based on your Shopify payment methods

header_newsletter.info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing " [customer list.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header_payment_methods.info: To add a payment methods, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)

header_follow_on_shop.info: Display follow button for your storefront on the Shop app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/vi/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

paragraph_social.content: To display your social media accounts, link them in your Theme settings.

paragraph_contact.content: To display your email address and phone number, link them in your Theme settings.

paragraph_newsletter.content: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

paragraph_first.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

paragraph_second.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: This content is from your blog post.

show_description.label: Show collection description
show_description.info: Edit your collection to add a description or image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_view_all.label: Show "View all" button if blog has more posts than being shown

metafield_keys.info: Enter product metafield keys to show (e.g. height, width, depth). 3 keys recommended. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/feature-product-list/#Product_specifications)
metafield_keys.label: Metafield keys

height.info: 70% and 100% screen height only work on large screens (mobile always set to 100% height).

map_address.info: Google Maps will load this location.
map_address.label: Address

custom_map_image_mobile.info: 750 x 900px .jpg recommended. Overrides Google map canvas on.
custom_map_image_mobile.label: Mobile custom map image

header_direction_button.content: Fill the Map address field for the directions link to appear.

value.info: Separate each value by a comma.
value.label: Value

product_results_per_row.label: Product results per row on mobile
product_results_per_row.info: Search results can displays products in 2 items per row, while blog posts and pages are displayed in 1 item per row.

header.info: Use the Search & Discovery app to customize search results for customers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/settings)

paragraph.content: Product recommendation show related products by default based on product information and orders. To select related products for a specific one, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#related-products)

paragraph_1.content: To choose related products for specific one, use the Search & Discovery app.[Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#related-products)

quick_links.label: Quick links
quick_links.info: Recommend limiting the number of quick links in your menu to 3.

paragraph_store_info.content: Store info in top bar is only visible on large screens.

display_in_product_page.info: Auto-generate column for currently viewed product.
display_in_product_page.label: Display in product page

product_comparison_metafield_keys.label: Comparison metafield keys
product_comparison_metafield_keys.info: Enter product metafield keys to compare in table (e.g. height, width, depth). [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/eletro-product-comparison/#Table)

metafield_keys.info: List product metafield keys you want to display (e.g. height, width, depth) separated by commas. Note: Only “One value" metafield type is supported and will be shown as heading and value in the comparison. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-detailed-specification/#Specifications)
metafield_keys.label: Metafield keys

specifications.info: To display product specifications, customize in Theme settings

metafield_keys.info: List metafield keys for download button display, separated by commas (e.g. height, width, depth).
metafield_keys.label: Metafield keys

file_download.info: Only “File" content types are supported for displaying file downloads. Set “Accept all file types" for file validation. We only support metafield type “One value". [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-detailed-specification/#File_download)

paragraph_menu.content: Match the Target section ID with the ID displayed at the bottom of the section to link it with the menu item. To show section ID, config in Appearance in Theme settings. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-product-template/#Product_sticky_bar)

show_purchasing.label: Show purchasing in sticky product menu

menu.info: Sticky menu enables scrolling to specific sections via menu items.

background_image.info: To make sure that the moving effect works properly, the combined width of all the images should be greater than the width of the container.
To make sure that the moving effect works properly, the combined width of all the images should be greater than the width of the container.

colors_body_text.label: Text
colors_body_text.info: Also used for text links and outline button

show_free_shipping_notification.label: Show free shipping notification
show_free_shipping_notification.info: Encourage customers add more to cart to earn free shipping.

minimum_order_price_for_free_shipping.label: Minimum order price for free shipping

enable_parallax_scrolling_prominent_badg.label: Enable parallax scrolling for Prominent badge

use_text_color.label: Use text color for image card's content

email_phone.name: Email address and phone number
email_phone.content: Electro uses store contact information by default, but you can enter alternative details in the fields below.

show_excerpt.label: Show excerpt
show_excerpt.info: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

enable_prominent_badges.info: Create a “Badge" metaobject with “content" and “color" fields, using “Single line text" and “Color" content types, respectively. Then, add a new collection_metafields definition with key “collection.badge" and metafield type 'Metaobject'. Finally, assign the created metaobject to the collection metafields and configure the badge appearance in collection settings. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-theme-settings/#Prominent_badge)
enable_prominent_badges.label: Enable prominent badges

predictive_search.info: Choose search results for customers. Products are selected by default.
predictive_search.heading: PREDICTIVE SEARCH RESULTS

popup.info: For pop-up components like notifications, menus, modals, etc.
popup.heading: POPUP COLOR

show_section_id_in_product_page.label: Show section ID in the Product template
show_section_id_in_product_page.info: Use section ID to map with Product menu item. Section IDs only visible in theme editor. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-theme-settings/#Appearance)

show_search_filter.info: Search filter will be generated based on product type. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-theme-settings/#Search)
show_search_filter.label: Show product filter

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

colors_swatches_rules.info: Format: <Variant option>: <value>(separated by lines). Example: Deep Purple: #7000AA Plastic: plastic.png. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-theme-settings/#Product_information)
colors_swatches_rules.label: Color swatches rules

header_color_swatches.info: Electro supports color options that display as swatches. Configure custom rules below.

specification.content: To display product specifications, provide the product metafield namespace. Only 'One value' metafield type is supported. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-theme-settings/#Product_information)

font_scale_level.info: Changing the font type scale will change the overall font size. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/electro-theme-settings/#Typography)
font_scale_level.label: Font scale level

paragraph_filter_and_sort.content: Applied to Collection and Search page.

enable_product_filter.label: Enable product filter
enable_product_filter.info: To customize Filters, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

expand_all_filter_options.label: Expand all filter options by default on mobile

paragraph_quick_links.content: Quick links can be shown in Top bar, menu drawer and footer section.

quick_links_menu.label: Quick links menu
quick_links_menu.info: Recommend limiting the number of quick links in your menu to 3.
